name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-imagecard-html-react-stock-price-chart
title: Stock Price Chart - Adaptive Card Extension
shortDescription: This Adaptive Card Extension (ACE) sample shows how to use HTML and React in an ACEs which was introduced in SPFx 1.20.0. This ACE allows you to see the stock price chart of a company. The stock price chart is displayed using the TradingView widget.
longDescription: This Adaptive Card extension (ACE) sample shows how to use HTML and React in an ACEs which was introduced in SPFx 1.20.0. This ACE allows you to see the stock price chart of a company. The stock price chart is displayed using the TradingView widget. The stock symbol, company name and currency are stored in the properties of ACE and are used by the widget in the QuickView.

references.name: Viva Connections Extensibility guidance
references.description: Adaptive Card Extensions are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.

references.name: Adaptive Card Documentation
references.description: Detailed documentation on Adaptive Cards including the Adaptive Card designer.

references.name: Adaptive Card Extension Design Guidance
references.description: Design guidance for laying out Adaptive Card Extensions.
